name: The VOREZKOR Hack (DEMO)
description:
You're a sewer dwelling gay prostitute in a dystopian future. The police force has been replaced by androids with programmed bloodlust and free reign to oppress the populace. In this demo, find you're way into the underground with your homie.

This is a point-and-click adventure game with pre-rendered 3d graphics. 

CONTROLS: Left-click to "Interact" with stuff, right-click to "Examine" stuff, and also to deselect items. That's it!

I wanna hear your feedback! Visit my discord server at https://discord.gg/aMRSWFGeNf or drop a comment to let me know how your playthrough was. 

For the full game, I'll be implementing full voice acting and survival horror elements. If that sounds like something you'd be interested in playing, give me a follow and keep updated on the game's progress.
